metadata.synopsis: One of the plaque in the Central Square.You need to click on the 3 plaques in a correct sequence to unlock a secret entrance to the secret room underneath the central square.The correct sequence: 2-3-1The plaques should either tell the history of Ketheric Thorm / this outpost or be some sort of propaganda.
